message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $1,000,000.  I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $900,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant.  I could consider coming down to $975,000. This is my final offer.
Thank you for considering my request, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I would like to propose $925,000 as a compromise. I hope this meets within your acceptable range.
